epiAnalyst Lite for Excel 

Risk Adjustment Analytics Toolkit by Episource 

DX/HCC Reference Tools

Getting Started: Basic Analysis

Analytics functions are callable from cells as Excel functions

  =epi.dx_desc("e119")

  =epi.dx2cc("E119, i420")

  =epi.dx_raf("E1100", "v24")

  =epi.dx_increment("N18.3", "N18.4")

  =epi.dx_gaps("e1100", "e119")

  =epi.cc_raf(“HCC58”)

  =epi.cc_increment(“19”, “18”)

Full list of functions and more examples
